title: [安全]Orebfuscator 1.6.5 —— 防透视|x-ray|cjb[1.4.2]
author: Saber_Actor
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Saber_Actor 于 2012-11-2 18:22 编辑 

This plugin is used to counter X-RAY Client mods.  It modifies data that are sent to clients to hide blocks of your choice, such as Ore, chests, dungeons, etc.  It does not manipulate blocks in the world file, thus is safe to use.  ProximityHider is a feature that hides chests that are far from players.
改动日志：
Fix 'chunks' field not found, again.
该插件用来防止各种透视扫描
它会修改数据发送到客户端来隐藏您所选择的块，如矿石，箱子，地牢等
并不直接修改地图文件
命令：无
权限：无
设置文件：
ObfuscateBlocks:   - 14   - 15   - 16   - 21   - 54   - 56   - 73   - 74   - 129   ProximityHiderBlocks:   - 23   - 54   - 56   - 58   - 61   - 62   - 116   - 129   RandomBlocks:    - 1  - 4 - 5  - 14 - 15  - 16 - 21 - 46  - 48  - 49  - 56 - 73 - 82 - 129
